___aliasOf.description: ID of the aliased reference. Note aliasing can be recursive.

___status.description: What state a spec is in. Is it a work in progress, completed, etc.

___versions.description: List of identifiers of published snapshot of this spec.

___publisher.description: Name of the publisher if any.

___obsoletedBy.description: Array of identifiers of specs which have replaced this one

___pages.description: Page number(s) where the reference is inside the titled document

___obsoletes.description: An array of specifications obsoloted by this specification.

___date.description: Date of publication in humand readable form, favor rawDate instead.

___versionOf.description: If this spec is a snapshot, this references the canonical document.
